sentences.en: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.cn: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

sentences.en: He sustained serious neck injuries after he broke someone's fall.
sentences.cn: 有人坠落压在他身上，致使他颈部受重伤。

sentences.en: He wanted to go into the street and carve someone's face up.
sentences.cn: 他想上街去把别人的脸刮花。

sentences.en: I have to tell someone. I can't keep it to myself.
sentences.cn: 我得找人说说。我心里憋不住。

sentences.en: If someone says something critical I take it to heart.
sentences.cn: 如果有人提出批评，我会十分介意。

sentences.en: It can be beneficial to share your feelings with someone you trust.
sentences.cn: 向自己信任的人倾诉感情是很有益处的。

sentences.en: Joyce traipsed from one doctor to another, praying that someone would listen.
sentences.cn: 乔伊丝从一位大夫奔波到另一位那里，期盼着有人会认真听她的话。

sentences.en: Our instinctive reaction when someone causes us pain is to strike back.
sentences.cn: 当被别人弄疼时我们本能的反应是反击。

sentences.en: Police officers on the case are reckoning to charge someone very shortly.
sentences.cn: 调查这个案子的警官正在考虑尽快起诉嫌疑人。

sentences.en: She had the look of someone deserted and betrayed.
sentences.cn: 她一副遭人遗弃和背叛的样子。

sentences.en: Someone comes in every day to check all is in order.
sentences.cn: 每天都有人来检查是否一切都井然有序。

sentences.en: Someone cranked up the volume of the public address system.
sentences.cn: 有人调大了公共广播系统的音量。

sentences.en: Someone introduced us and I sat next to him.
sentences.cn: 有人给我们作了介绍，我挨着他坐下了。

sentences.en: The job needs someone with a good track record in investment.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要有良好投资业绩的人来担当。

sentences.en: We usually think of a victim of mugging as being someone elderly.
sentences.cn: 我们通常以为被拦路抢劫的受害者是老年人。

sentences.en: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.cn: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.en: When someone has hayfever, the eyes and nose will stream and itch.
sentences.cn: 花粉热临床表现为流泪、流涕，眼睛、鼻子发痒。

sentences.en: Will someone please explain what’s going on?

trans.tran_en: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is
